page.title: 17LAWRANCE PARK.
page.content: In the entrance to the hall is aboard that tells you when the hall was opened and how it got its name.We use the hall and field in the day and all kinds of people use it at night and at the weekends.Monday night is Youth Club.I go to that.Tuesday is Ladies Gym.Wednesday is Badminton and Friday is Cubs.On Saturdays and Sundays the Football and the Cricket Clubs play on the field.People have parties dances discos and wedding parties there. My mum is in the W.I.and they have a big Art and Craft competition in September and there is a part for children.The best part of the park are the swings and slides and things to play on.It was good in the infants because when we came out of school mum would let us go and play on them.A Lot of people take dogs for walks round the park.
